72.brief: from out, out from among, from
72.long: from out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards.

72.brief: second, in the second place, for the second time
72.long: second; with the article: in the second place, for the second time.
a cock, rooster.
I give forth a sound, hence: (a) of a cock: I crow, (b) of men: I shout, (c) trans: I call (to myself), summon; I invite, address.
and, even, also, namely.
I remind, admonish, am reminded, remind myself; pass: I remember, recall.
the, the definite article.
Peter, a Greek name meaning "rock".
the, the definite article.
a thing spoken, (a) a word or saying of any kind, as command, report, promise, (b) a thing, matter, business.

72.brief: as, like as, how, while, so that
72.long: as, like as, about, as it were, according as, how, when, while, as soon as, so that.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

72.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
72.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
the, the definite article.
Jesus; the Greek form of Joshua; Jesus, son of Eliezer; Jesus, surnamed Justus.
that, since, because; may introduce direct discourse.
formerly, before.
a cock, rooster.
twice, entirely, utterly.
I give forth a sound, hence: (a) of a cock: I crow, (b) of men: I shout, (c) trans: I call (to myself), summon; I invite, address.
three times.
I, the first-person pronoun.
I deny, disown, repudiate (either another person or myself), disregard.
and, even, also, namely.

72.brief: I throw upon, lay, strike upon
72.long: (a) I throw upon, cast over, (b) I place upon, (c) I lay, (d) intrans: I strike upon, rush.
I weep, weep for, mourn, lament.
